title: Nature Domain
content: otherworldly creature and attach its consciousness to your own. It will follow and fight for you as an ally. 10 Turns Target must be a celestial, an elemental, a fey, or a fiend. 18m WIS SaveConcentration SEEMING Lv 5 Illusion Action Disguise up to 4 memebers of your adventuring party. 18m TELEKINESIS Lv 5 Transmutation Action Throw a creature or object up to 18m with a thought. Once per turn, yhou can use Telekinesis again without expending a spell slot. 10 Turns STR SaveConcentration BLADE BAR
